articles.description: All the latest football news and reaction as Manchester United are knocked out of the FA Cup by Fulham and Manchester City are drawn away to Bournemouth in the quarter-finals.
articles.title: Man Utd knocked out of FA Cup by Fulham & Man City get Bournemouth in quarter-final - reaction

articles.description: The NFL could soon have its own two-way superstar, but Draft prospect Travis Hunter is such a rarity that teams are unsure what to do with him.
articles.title: Travis Hunter: Which NFL team will draft him? And what is a two-way player?

articles.description: Ruben Amorim is called "naive" by Wayne Rooney after the Portuguese said Manchester United want to win the Premier League title.
articles.title: Man Utd manager Amorim called 'naive' by Rooney over Premier League title ambition

articles.description: India will face Australia in the first semi-final of the Champions Trophy on Tuesday, having beaten New Zealand to finish top of Group A.
articles.title: Champions Trophy 2025 results: India beat New Zealand to set up Australia semi-final

articles.description: Former Real Madrid captain Sergio Ramos scores his first goal for Monterrey since joining Mexican side, while Lionel Messi left out by Inter Miami.
articles.title: Sergio Ramos scores first Monterrey goal and Lionel Messi left out by Inter Miami

articles.description: Luka Doncic scores 29 points as the Los Angeles Lakers continue their revival with victory over the Los Angeles Clippers.
articles.title: NBA results: LA Lakers 108-102 LA Clippers - Luka Doncic shines again for Lakers

articles.description: Millie David, Charlotte Fray, Jade Shekells and Sarah Parry are in the England Women's training squad for the first time ahead of the Six Nations.
articles.title: Women's Six Nations: Millie David among England camp call-ups

articles.title: FA Cup quarter-finals draw: Bournemouth v Man City, Preston v Aston Villa

articles.description: World champion Luke Littler wins the UK Open for the first time with a stunning 11-2 victory over James Wade in Minehead.
articles.title: UK Open: Teenager Luke Littler thrashes James Wade in final to win £110,000 in Minehead
